targets.rawSql: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(areaName) FROM area WHERE areaId IN ($administrativeDistrictIds)

SELECT
  CONCAT(
    SUM(IF(ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated.completedSections = totalSections, 1, 0)), "/", COUNT(*), " - ",
    ROUND(SUM(IF(ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated.completedSections = totalSections, 1, 0)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
  ) AS ""
FROM
(SELECT
  SUM(IF(verifiedTallySheetCount = totalTallySheetCount, 1, 0)) AS completedSections, COUNT(*) AS totalSections
FROM
  ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status
WHERE
  ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.incrementId IN (SELECT MAX(ext_pce2021_dashboard_increment.id) from ext_pce2021_dashboard_increment WHERE ext_pce2021_dashboard_increment.active=1)
  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.electionId = $rootElectionId
  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.administrativeDistrictId IN ($administrativeDistrictIds)
  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.templateName = "PCE-35"
  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.voteType = "NonPostal"
GROUP BY
  ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.pollingDivisionId) AS ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated

SELECT
  CONCAT(
    SUM(IF(ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated.completedSections = totalSections, 1, 0)), "/", COUNT(*), " - ",

SELECT
  ROUND(SUM(ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated.completedSections) * 100 / SUM(totalSections), 0) AS value

(SELECT

  statusReportId

WHERE

ORDER BY createdAt

  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.templateName = "PCE-PD-V"
  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.voteType = "Postal"
GROUP BY
  ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.partyId) AS ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated

SELECT
  CONCAT(
    SUM(IF(ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated.completedSections = totalSections, 1, 0)), "/", COUNT(*), " - ",
    ROUND(SUM(IF(ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated.completedSections = totalSections, 1, 0)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
  ) AS ""
FROM
(SELECT
  SUM(IF(verifiedTallySheetCount = totalTallySheetCount, 1, 0)) AS completedSections, COUNT(*) AS totalSections
FROM
  ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status
WHERE
  ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.incrementId IN (SELECT MAX(ext_pce2021_dashboard_increment.id) from ext_pce2021_dashboard_increment WHERE ext_pce2021_dashboard_increment.active=1)
  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.electionId = $rootElectionId
  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.administrativeDistrictId IN ($administrativeDistrictIds)
  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.templateName = "PCE-PD-V"
  and ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.voteType = "Displaced"
GROUP BY
  ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.partyId) AS ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated

SELECT
  ROUND(SUM(ext_pce2021_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated.completedSections) * 100 / SUM(totalSections), 0) AS value

(SELECT

list.definition: SELECT CONCAT(electionId, ' - ', electionName) as __text,  electionId as __value from election WHERE electionTemplateName = 'PROVINCIAL_COUNCIL_ELECTION_2021' and parentElectionId IS NULL;
list.label: Election
list.name: rootElectionId
list.query: SELECT CONCAT(electionId, ' - ', electionName) as __text,  electionId as __value from election WHERE electionTemplateName = 'PROVINCIAL_COUNCIL_ELECTION_2021' and parentElectionId IS NULL;

list.definition:
SELECT 
  areaName AS __text, areaId AS __value 
FROM area, election 
WHERE 
  election.electionId = area.electionId and election.rootElectionId = $rootElectionId and areaType = 'AdministrativeDistrict';
list.name: administrativeDistrictIds
list.query:
SELECT 
  areaName AS __text, areaId AS __value 
FROM area, election 
WHERE 
  election.electionId = area.electionId and election.rootElectionId = $rootElectionId and areaType = 'AdministrativeDistrict';

title: Provincial Council Election 2021 - Counting - Administrative District
